description:
In the moments before battle, the beautiful gladiator Rebecca flashes back to the tragic events of her childhood and the toy soldier who became her constant companion.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Je te protègerai jusqu’au bout. Rebecca et le Petit Soldat !
Mamorinuku! Rebecca to Omocha no Heitai
Protect You to the End! Rebecca and the Toy Soldier!
Защищать её до конца. Ребекка и игрушечный солдатик
守り抜く! レベッカとおもちゃの兵隊
